#summary This document describes how to use compile a new PSISCORE server from the source code provided.
#labels Phase-Deploy

=PSISCORE web service=
The source code of the PSISCORE web service reference implementation can be found in the download section of the project. PSISCORE relies on Maven for managing Java dependencies and project setting. Therefore, all you need to do in order to build your own, personal PSISCORE server is start the maven build process.
